name: User Access Review
risk_text: Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive systems due to stale or overly permissive user accounts.
control_text: Quarterly, the system owner reviews all user accounts with privileged access. Any accounts that are no longer required are disabled within 24 hours of identification.

name: Password Policy
risk_text: Risk of account compromise through weak or easily guessable passwords.
control_text: All user passwords must be a minimum of 12 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters. Passwords must be changed every 90 days.

name: Data Encryption in Transit
risk_text: Risk of data interception and theft as it moves across the network.
control_text: All internal and external network traffic is encrypted using TLS 1.2 or higher.
